[invenio_base.apps]

[invenio_celery.tasks]
invenio_workflows_tugraz_theses = invenio_workflows_tugraz.theses.tasks

[invenio_db.alembic]

[invenio_db.models]

[invenio_i18n.translations]

[invenio_jobs.jobs]
